title: bcd-watch rss feed
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
10 New Universal Implementations Reported!

api

  1. Element ➞ ariaBrailleLabel Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines

  3. ElementInternals ➞ ariaBrailleLabel Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
  4. ElementInternals ➞ ariaBrailleRoleDescription Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines
  5. createImageBitmap ➞ svgimageelement_as_source_image Added to safari Now in 3 of 3 engines

  1. types ➞ mod Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  2. types ➞ rem Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines
  3. types ➞ round Added to chrome Now in 3 of 3 engines

webextensions

  1. manifest ➞ options_page Added to firefox Now in 3 of 3 engines

css
